languages.text: "Так вам... не доложили?" {n}После вспышки удивления звучит недолгая пауза.{/n} "О, прошу, не гневайтесь на Вигдис, шерин! Она лишь передала сообщение личного содержание тому, кому оно предназначалось. Ну а я сразу же пришла к вам".

traits.locale_text: "Так вам... не доложили?" {n}После вспышки удивления звучит недолгая пауза.{/n} "О, прошу, не гневайтесь на Вигдис, шерин! Она лишь передала сообщение личного содержание тому, кому оно предназначалось. Ну а я сразу же пришла к вам".

languages.text: "So, nobody... reported it to you?" {n}A quick burst of surprise is followed by a pregnant pause.{/n} "Oh, shereen, please do not be angry with Vigdis! She merely related a personal message to the person it was intended for. And I immediately came to you."
languages.original_text: "Так вам... не доложили?" {n}После вспышки удивления звучит недолгая пауза.{/n} "О, прошу, не гневайтесь на Вигдис, шерин! Она лишь передала сообщение личного содержание тому, кому оно предназначалось. Ну а я сразу же пришла к вам".

traits.locale_text: "So nobody... reported it to you?" {n}A quick burst of surprise is followed by a pregnant pause.{/n} "Oh, shereen, please do not be angry with Vigdis! She merely related a personal message to the person it was intended for. And I immediately came to you."

"So nobody... reported it to you?" {n}A quick burst of surprise is followed by a pregnant pause.{/n} "Oh, shereen, please do not be angry with Vigdis! She merely related a personal message to the person it was intended for. And I immediately came to you."

"So, nobody... reported it to you?" {n}A quick burst of surprise is followed by a pregnant pause.{/n} "Oh, shereen, please do not be angry with Vigdis! She merely related a personal message to the person it was intended for. And I immediately came to you."

"So, nobody... reported it to you?" {n}A quick burst of surprise is followed by a pregnant pause.{/n} "Oh, shereen, please do not be angry with Vigdis! She merely related a personal message to the person it was intended for. And I immediately came to you."

"So, nobody... reported it to you?" {n}A quick burst of surprise is followed by a pregnant pause.{/n} "Oh, shereen, please do not be angry with Vigdis! She merely related a personal message to the person it was intended for. And I immediately came to you."

languages.text: “也就是说，还没有人……向你报告过吗？”{n}婕伊的声音充满了惊讶，随后是意味深长的停顿。{/n}“噢，亲爱的，请千万不要生维格迪斯的气！她只是把那条私人信息传达给了收件人，而我收到信息之后，立刻就来找你了。”
languages.original_text: "So, nobody... reported it to you?" {n}A quick burst of surprise is followed by a pregnant pause.{/n} "Oh, shereen, please do not be angry with Vigdis! She merely related a personal message to the person it was intended for. And I immediately came to you."

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，还没有人……向你报告过吗？”{n}婕伊的声音充满了惊讶，随后是意味深长的停顿。{/n}“噢，亲爱的，请千万不要生维格迪斯的气！她只是把那条私人信息传达给了收件人，而我收到信息之后，立刻就来找你了。”

languages.text: « Vous voulez dire que... personne ne vous en a parlé avant moi ? » {n}demande-t-elle avec surprise, avant de se taire pendant un instant.{/n} « Shereen, je vous en prie, n'en voulez pas à Vigdis ! Elle n'a fait que transmettre un message à la personne à laquelle il était destiné, et je vous ai {mf|contacté|contactée} immédiatement. »
languages.original_text: "So, nobody... reported it to you?" {n}A quick burst of surprise is followed by a pregnant pause.{/n} "Oh, shereen, please do not be angry with Vigdis! She merely related a personal message to the person it was intended for. And I immediately came to you."

traits.locale_text: « Vous voulez dire que... personne ne vous en a parlé avant moi ? » {n}demande-t-elle avec surprise, avant de se taire pendant un instant.{/n} « Shereen, je vous en prie, n'en voulez pas à Vigdis ! Elle n'a fait que transmettre un message à la personne à laquelle il était destiné, et je vous ai {mf|contacté|contactée} immédiatement. »

languages.text: «Ah, ¿nadie {mf|lo|la} ha avisado?». {n}Tras una rápida reacción de sorpresa, realiza una pausa significativa.{/n} «Por favor, sheeren, ¡no se enfade con Vigdis! Ella solo quería relatar el mensaje a la persona a la que iba destinado. Y yo vine inmediatamente a contárselo».
languages.original_text: "So, nobody... reported it to you?" {n}A quick burst of surprise is followed by a pregnant pause.{/n} "Oh, shereen, please do not be angry with Vigdis! She merely related a personal message to the person it was intended for. And I immediately came to you."

traits.locale_text: «Ah, ¿nadie {mf|lo|la} ha avisado?». {n}Tras una rápida reacción de sorpresa, realiza una pausa significativa.{/n} «Por favor, sheeren, ¡no se enfade con Vigdis! Ella solo quería relatar el mensaje a la persona a la que iba destinado. Y yo vine inmediatamente a contárselo».

languages.text: 「それで、誰も…アンタにそれを報告しなかったのか？」{n}驚きの間の後に、会話の途切れが意味ありげに続いた。{/n}「ああ、シャリーン、どうかヴィグディスを怒らないでやってくれ！彼女は単に個人的なメッセージを、意図された相手に伝えただけなんだ。そして、あたしはすぐにアンタのところに来た」
languages.original_text: "So, nobody... reported it to you?" {n}A quick burst of surprise is followed by a pregnant pause.{/n} "Oh, shereen, please do not be angry with Vigdis! She merely related a personal message to the person it was intended for. And I immediately came to you."

traits.locale_text: 「それで、誰も…アンタにそれを報告しなかったのか？」{n}驚きの間の後に、会話の途切れが意味ありげに続いた。{/n}「ああ、シャリーン、どうかヴィグディスを怒らないでやってくれ！彼女は単に個人的なメッセージを、意図された相手に伝えただけなんだ。そして、あたしはすぐにアンタのところに来た」

languages.text: "Euch hat niemand ... Bescheid gegeben?" {n}Sie ist kurz erstaunt und hält dann inne.{/n} "Oh, Shereen, seid bitte nicht böse auf Vigdis! Sie hat lediglich eine persönliche Nachricht an die Person weitergeleitet, für die diese auch bestimmt war. Und ich bin damit sofort zu Euch gekommen."
languages.original_text: "So, nobody... reported it to you?" {n}A quick burst of surprise is followed by a pregnant pause.{/n} "Oh, shereen, please do not be angry with Vigdis! She merely related a personal message to the person it was intended for. And I immediately came to you."

traits.locale_text: "Euch hat niemand ... Bescheid gegeben?" {n}Sie ist kurz erstaunt und hält dann inne.{/n} "Oh, Shereen, seid bitte nicht böse auf Vigdis! Sie hat lediglich eine persönliche Nachricht an die Person weitergeleitet, für die diese auch bestimmt war. Und ich bin damit sofort zu Euch gekommen."

languages.text: "Aa, kimse sana... Haber vermedi mi?" {n}Jae, kısa bir şaşkınlığın ardından ağzının içine bakar gibi duraksıyor.{/n} "Of şirinim, ne olur Vigdis'e kızma! Eline şahsi bir mesaj geçmiş, o da bunu asıl sahibine teslim etmiş. Ben de hemen yanına geldim işte."
languages.original_text: "So, nobody... reported it to you?" {n}A quick burst of surprise is followed by a pregnant pause.{/n} "Oh, shereen, please do not be angry with Vigdis! She merely related a personal message to the person it was intended for. And I immediately came to you."
